Loading bous... \n Sa a pouvwa pran yon kèk minit kòm li se premye fwa a antre nan aparèy sa a.
Loading %1$d nan %2$d bous. \n This ka pran yon kèk minit kòm li se premye fwa a antre nan aparèy sa a.

Gen yon problèm pou jwenn sèvè a. Tanpri eseye ankò.
Erè koneksyon: paka jwenn sèvè a
Pa gen Rezilta yo te jwenn
Nou paka lokalize kote a. Tanpri aktive sèvis lokalizasyon an.
Pa gen Rezilta yo te jwenn
Aktive sevis lokalizasyon an pou pi bon rezilta
Pa gen kategori ki soti nan sèvè a
Pa gen aktivite ki enstale pou jere apèl telefòn.
Nou paka jwenn kont ou an. asirew ke non itilizatè ou korèk.
Nou paka konekte sou sèvè a. Eseye nan yon lòt moman.
Nou paka jwenn kesyon rekiperasyon pou itilizatè sa a
PIN lan dwe on valè nimerik.
Twòp tantativ ki echwe. Konekte apresa nan %1$s segonn.
Kont [%1$s] bezwen modpas. ou paka antre sou kont lan ak yon nouvo aparèy san modpas.
Glise pou ou wè repètwa antrepriz la
Itilizatè sa a pa gen oken kesyon pou rekiperasyon!
Efase %1$s sèlman sou aparèy sa a. Sa ap efase 2FA ak aksè avèk PIN nan aparèy sa a. Si 2FA aktive sou kont sa a, ou pa kapab antre nan kont sa a pandan 7 jou a pati de nouvo aparèy
Modpas la dwe gen yon lèt majiskil, youn miniskil, yon chif epi 10 mo pou pi piti
Dwe gen pou pi piti yon lèt majiskil
Dwe gen pou pi piti yon lèt miniskil
Dwe gen pou pi piti yon chif
Dwe gen pou pi piti 10 mo
Ou dwe antre yon non itilizatè
Modpas yo pa sanble, antre modpas la anko.
Enksripsyon an echwe:\nnon itilizatè a dwe genyen pou pi piti 3 karaktè.

This is not your email or real name.

This is the username to login into your account on this and other devices.

Your username and password are known only to you and never stored unencrypted.
The Password is used to authenticate your account and to change sensitive settings.
Warning. Without a password, you will not be able to login on a new device if this device is lost or stolen, or if this app is uninstalled.
Warning. Without a password, you will not be able to login on a new device if this device is lost or stolen, or if this app is uninstalled.
Your PIN is a 4 digit code used to do quick re-logins into your account.
Your username, password, and pin are known only to you and never transmitted or stored unencrypted.
**WARNING** You will NEVER be able to recover your password if it is forgotten!!
You must answer all questions. Make sure your answers are long enough.
You must choose all questions before proceeding.

Your password recovery questions and answers are now set up.

To recovery your password, click on the link you just emailed yourself and answer your recovery questions. Your answers must match exactly.

**DO NOT FORGET YOUR USERNAME AND RECOVERY ANSWERS**

YOUR ACCOUNT CANNOT BE RECOVERED WITHOUT THEM!!

Bluetooth is used to allow payments wirelessly without needing to scan a QR code. Would you like to turn it on now?

This account has 2 Factor Authentication (2FA) enabled. Scan the 2FA token from the device that enabled 2FA to give access to this device.
Request that the Two Factor authentication be turned off. The request will automatically reset in 7 days if no action is taken by the account user on authenticated devices.
Unable to determine two factor status
Enable 2-Factor Authentication to increase security by only allowing logins from previously logged in devices. Add more devices by scanning the QR code below after 2FA is enabled
Two factor reset has been requested.
Two Factor Authentication (enchanced security) has been enabled from a different device for this account. Please enable 2 Factor Authentication for full access from this device.
The Two Factor Authentication token on this device is invalid. Either the token was changed by a different device or your clock is skewed. Please check your system time to ensure it is correct.
We are sorry we are unable to import the token at this time.
The two factor authentication token import failed. Please ensure you have the correct token!
If you lose your device or uninstall the %1$s app, it will take 7 days to disable 2FA and access your account.
A two factor reset has been requested. Please login as %1$s and approve or cancel the request.

\"To complete account recovery setup you MUST save an account recovery token. This will be required to recover your account in addition to your username and recovery answers. Please enter your email below to send yourself the recovery token.

Please click the link below from a mobile device with %1$s installed to initiate account recovery for username [%2$s]\n\n

%3$s
Tanpri antre non itilizatè a nan kont lan refè
Recovery was not setup or was done on another device
Si rekiperasyon te konfigirasyon, ou ta dwe te kouriyèl tèt ou yon token rekiperasyon ak yon lyen
Please find the email and click on the link from this device to initiate recovery
Kòrèk non itilizatè pou sa a token gerizon. Tanpri eseye yon non itilizatè diferan oswa sèvi ak yon diferan lyen rekiperasyon token.
Tanpri soti nan kont kouran anvan eseye rekiperasyon modpas
Rekiperasyon siksè \n\n Tanpri chanje modpas ou ak PIN
kont sa a deja gen konfigirasyon rekiperasyon modpas. Èske ou ta renmen enfim li?
Aplikasyon sa a ta renmen jwenn aksè nan zarchiv sa yo lye nan kont Airbitz ou yo. Li pa pral gen aksè a nenpòt lòt kont oswa bous.
Tanpri verifye domèn nan pi wo a ak tiyo LOGIN to legalized ak sit sa a
